project_basics_section.question: What is the project language?
project_basics_section.help_text: Language for task names and descriptions

project_basics_section.question: What country/countries is the client operating in?
project_basics_section.help_text: Affects accounting localization and tax configuration

project_basics_section.question: Project Start Date
project_basics_section.help_text: When will the project kick off? Used to calculate task dates.

adoption_details_section.question: How many months of adoption support?
adoption_details_section.help_text: Duration of post-go-live support period (typically 1-3 months)

adoption_details_section.question: Adoption support will be distributed as:
adoption_details_section.help_text: Hours will be allocated evenly across the adoption period for ongoing support, training, and knowledge base maintenance.

implementation_details_section.question: How many legal entities/companies?
implementation_details_section.help_text: Number of separate legal entities to manage in Odoo

updated_help_texts.adoption_phase_checkbox: User training, go-live support, and ongoing assistance (replaces 'hypercare')
updated_help_texts.customization_scope: Describe the custom features needed. This will generate custom development tasks with estimated hours based on complexity.

clarification_notes.language: When Spanish is selected, all task names and descriptions will be shown in Spanish in the generated plan
clarification_notes.country: Accounting tasks will be adjusted based on country (e.g., Mexico vs US have different tax requirements)
clarification_notes.adoption_duration: System will create 'Ongoing Support - Month X' tasks for each month, distributing remaining hours after core adoption tasks
clarification_notes.multi_company: If Yes, additional accounting and configuration tasks for inter-company transactions will be added
